content: * ARCONIC TO BE ACQUIRED BY APOLLO FUNDS* ARCONIC CORP - ALL-CASH TRANSACTION THAT VALUES COMPANY AT AN ENTERPRISE VALUE OF APPROXIMATELY $5.2 BILLION* ARCONIC CORP - AGREEMENT PROVIDES THAT ARCONIC SHAREHOLDERS WILL RECEIVE $30.00 PER SHARE IN CASH* ARCONIC CORP - PROPOSED DEAL FOR $30.00 PER SHARE* ARCONIC CORP: TRANSACTION INCLUDES A MINORITY INVESTMENT FROM FUNDS MANAGED BY AFFILIATES OF IRENIC CAPITAL MANAGEMENT* ARCONIC CORP - TRANSACTION INCLUDES A MINORITY INVESTMENT FROM FUNDS MANAGED BY AFFILIATES OF IRENIC CAPITAL MANAGEMENT* ARCONIC CORP - TRANSACTION IS EXPECTED TO CLOSE IN SECOND HALF OF 2023 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
